elements.content: This is the #1 concern we hear. Let me show you our four-layer safety system:

elements.title: Conservative Start
elements.description: We begin with universally safe filters: debug logs, duplicate events, bot traffic, test data. These account for 40-60% of volume but are never queried. Zero business risk.

elements.title: Shadow Mode Testing
elements.description: Before dropping ANY data, we run in shadow mode for 1-4 weeks. You see what WOULD be filtered, but nothing actually changes. Compare shadow metrics against actual query patterns. Validate assumptions before going live.

elements.title: Usage Analytics
elements.description: We track what's filtered vs. what's queried. After 30 days, you get a report: 'You filtered 10TB of logs. 0.02% were later queried.' This data-driven approach removes guesswork and proves safety.

elements.title: Tiered Storage Fallback
elements.description: For paranoid-but-practical scenarios: Route filtered data to S3/GCS at $0.02/GB (instead of Snowflake at $0.50/GB). You get 25x cost reduction plus an archive. If you need it later, it's there. Most customers never touch it.

layer_by_layer.layer_2: [Point to card 2] Layer two: Shadow mode. Before dropping ANY data, we run in shadow mode for 1 to 4 weeks. You see what WOULD be filtered, but nothing actually changes. You compare shadow metrics against actual query patterns. Validate assumptions before going live.
layer_by_layer.layer_3: [Point to card 3] Layer three: Usage analytics. We track what's filtered versus what's queried. After 30 days, you get a report: 'You filtered 10 terabytes of logs. 0.02% were later queried.' This data-driven approach removes guesswork.
layer_by_layer.layer_4: [Point to card 4] Layer four: Tiered storage fallback. For the truly paranoid‚Äîand I mean that affectionately‚Äîroute filtered data to S3 at 2 cents per gigabyte instead of Snowflake at 50 cents per gigabyte. You get 25x cost reduction plus an archive. If you need it later, it's there. Most customers never touch it.

presentation_notes.closer: [Point to bottom stat] Here's the result: In 3 years and 50+ customers, we've had zero data loss incidents. Zero.
presentation_notes.transition: Does that address the concern? [Pause for response] Great. Let's talk about next steps.
